overview_of_class: Narrative cinema is often evaluated according to standards of "realism" or "naturalism." But there are other modes of film style and reception that promote an anti-realist aesthetic. This course will present a symposium of ten films that explore the politics and possibilities of a cinema that does not aspire to the illusion of verisimilitude.
name: Film & TV Criticism
title: SoC RTVF 326-0-20 Film & TV Criticism
